qas.question: What were interiors seeking to recreate?
What colors were utilized for interiors?

answers.text: "Pompeiian red" or pale tints, or stone colours

qas.question: Who brought Louis XVI style to the court?
What types of techniques were used to style motifs?

answers.text: flatter, lighter motifs, sculpted in low frieze-like relief or painted in monotones

qas.question: What were styles in France initially?

plausible_answers.text: authentically Roman and genuinely interior vocabulary

qas.question: What did new exteriors try to re-create?

plausible_answers.text: flatter, lighter motifs, sculpted in low frieze-like relief or painted in monotones en camaïeu ("like cameos"),

What we brought the Gout grec style to court?

Phong cách ở Pháp ban đầu là <a4_0> Người Paris <a4_0/> Phong cách, <b7_0> Goût grec <b7_0/> ("Phong cách Hy Lạp"), không phải kiểu tòa án; khi Louis XVI lên ngôi năm 1774, <a2_0><b8_0> Marie Antoinette <a2_0/> , <b8_0/> Nữ hoàng yêu thương thời trang của anh, mang phong cách "Louis XVI" ra tòa.
